title: Lord of the Rings API Scraper
description: Fetch comprehensive data from The One API to rule them all. Scrape books, movies, characters, quotes, and chapters from J.R.R. Tolkien's epic universe with advanced filtering and sorting options.

entity.title: Entity Type
entity.description: Choose which type of data to scrape from Tolkien's universe.

limit.title: Results per page
limit.description: Number of results to fetch per API page (max 100).

maxPages.title: Maximum pages to scrape
maxPages.description: Maximum number of API pages to fetch. Use higher values for complete datasets.

sort.title: Sort order
sort.description: Sort results by field and direction (e.g., 'name:asc', 'runtimeInMinutes:desc').

characterName.title: Character Name
characterName.description: Filter characters by name (substring match, case-insensitive).

characterRace.title: Character Race
characterRace.description: Filter characters by race (substring match, e.g., Hobbit, Elf, Man, Dwarf).

characterGender.title: Character Gender
characterGender.description: Filter characters by gender (substring match, Male, Female).

movieRuntimeInMinutes.title: Movie Runtime (minutes)
movieRuntimeInMinutes.description: Filter movies by runtime in minutes (substring match).

quoteDialog.title: Quote Dialog
quoteDialog.description: Filter quotes by dialog text (substring match).

quoteMovie.title: Quote Movie
quoteMovie.description: Filter quotes by movie name or ID (substring match).

quoteCharacter.title: Quote Character
quoteCharacter.description: Filter quotes by character name or ID (substring match).

chapterName.title: Chapter Name
chapterName.description: Filter chapters by chapter name (substring match).

chapterBook.title: Chapter Book
chapterBook.description: Filter chapters by book name or ID (substring match).

customFilters.title: Custom Filters
customFilters.description: Advanced custom filters using MongoDB query syntax (e.g., {"name": "/foot/i", "height": {"$exists": true}}).
